title: Bug 17423 - Revert appears twice in the popup menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When opening the popup menu in a Java editor, the Revert option is displayed twice.
EB: There should only be one Revert option displayed in the popup menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Popup the menu.
3) Observe that there are two Revert options, one after UNDO and the other before FORMAT.
